title: Did Joe Biden ever say he was reserved for most cases except civil rights?
subtitle: Paiden's remarks appeared in a broad "Washington" feature in 1974 after his election as the youngest member of the United States Senate.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Joe Biden once said: "When it comes to civil rights and civil liberties, I am liberal, but that is the case. And I'm really keeping up most of the other cases."
